definition: epidemic encephalitis B, aka Japanese encephalitis

pinyin: Wei3 nei4 rui4 la1 ma3 nao3 yan2 bing4 du2
dong1 fang1 ma3 nao3 yan2 bing4 du2
xi1 fang1 ma3 nao3 yan2 bing4 du2

sentences.english: Objective To prepare purified tick - borne encephalitis vaccine.
sentences.chinese: 目的製備森林腦炎純化疫苗。

sentences.english: How does cheeper prevent summer virus sex encephalitis?
sentences.chinese: 夏天幼兒怎樣預防病毒性腦炎？

sentences.english: Objective Analyze the clinical characteristics of Postinfectious encephalitis according to cases.
sentences.chinese: 目的根據臨牀病例分析並總結感染後腦炎的臨牀特徵。

sentences.english: Insect-borne diseases like dengue fever, tick-borne encephalitis and malaria will spread.
sentences.chinese: 蟲媒傳染病，如登革熱，森林腦炎，瘧疾正在蔓延。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the clinical value of electroencephalograph in diagnosis of viral encephalitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討腦電圖在病毒性腦炎診斷中的作用。

sentences.english: Nipah virus causes acute encephalitis in human, with high mortality.
sentences.chinese: 尼帕病毒引起人類急性腦炎，病死率高。

sentences.english: The colonel had been attacked by brain fever three days previously.
sentences.chinese: 上校害了三天的大腦炎。

sentences.english: Japanese encephalitis virus, which is of Flaviridae, is a critical arbovirus jeopardized to people and animals.
sentences.chinese: 日本腦炎病毒是一種嚴重威脅人畜健康的蟲媒病毒。

sentences.english: Put BBE in your products to make them sound better.
sentences.chinese: 在您的產品放入腦幹腦炎，使他們更好的聲音。

sentences.english: A few fatal cases of postinfectious encephalitis have been reported.
sentences.chinese: 曾有幾例病後腦炎致死的報道。

sentences.english: Human infections range from asymptomatic infection to fatal encephalitis.
sentences.chinese: 人類感染從無症狀感染到致命的腦炎情況不同。

sentences.english: Herbs for the prevention of encephalitis can be found everywhere in this area.
sentences.chinese: 預防腦炎的草藥在這一地區俯拾皆是。

sentences.english: The result Showed that if was valuable to study the epidemiology of Russion spring-Summer encephalitis in Yunnan Prowince.
sentences.chinese: 對我省森林腦炎流行病學的研究具有重要參考價值。

sentences.english: It can also lead to meningitis, encephalitis, pulmonary edema and paralysis in some children.
sentences.chinese: 它可導致腦膜炎，腦炎，肺浮腫及癱瘓。

sentences.english: A small number of people who recover subsequently relapse or develop delayed onset encephalitis.
sentences.chinese: 少數人康復後又復發或罹患遲發性腦炎。

sentences.english: A vaccine for Japanese encephalitis which will be submitted shortly to WHO for prequalification.
sentences.chinese: 一種日本腦炎的疫苗，它即將提交世界衛生組織預審。

definition: epidemic encephalitis B (abbr. for 乙型腦炎|乙型脑炎[yi3 xing2 nao3 yan2])
